title: ISS Daily Summary Report – 5/08/2024
summary: Payloads: Fluids Integrated Rack/Flow Boiling and Condensation Experiment (FIR/FBCE) – The crew searched for and located an FBCE Test Module power cable. This cable was removed last year, but not found in the FIR hardware returned to the ground on SpX-29. More information on the FIR facility can be found here. KEyence Research Microscope Testbed …
